text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Welcome! This is the venue for the Trainer Skill Exam!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: The goal is to increase the guidance skills of all Trainers toward their Umamusume! By all means, please take on this challenge!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: For now! The only thing to do is practice, surely. You may choose to eliminate weaknesses, or you may choose to enhance strengths.
Of course, I have also prepared rewards, so it is also acceptable to use those as motivation!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Take heart! The harder you strive, the prouder your assigned Umamusume will become!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Encouragement! I sincerely pray for the improvement of your skills! Hahahaha!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
